topics.body:
Wow. . . . I just got a gut punch to the heart:
A random stranger that I barely know and don't even know her name cares more about my well being than anyone from my family.

Family:
How many kids you have determines how much we love you.

Random stranger:
That doesn't make any sense; why would a person without any kids be any less of a person?
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539f268a6368722949be0300#post_539f268a6368722949be0300

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539f26fd636872346b980300#post_539f26fd636872346b980300
Not really; family's pissing me off and so is my school.

Family:
How many kids you have determines how much of a person you are.

School:
We don't give a shit about you; we'll claim to, but at the end of the day all we care about is tenure.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539f299763687253f4c00300#post_539f299763687253f4c00300
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539f27aa6368723333370100#post_539f27aa6368723333370100
Well all I can really do is give moral support through the internet.
I know you're a good person. And even if they don't give two shits about you there are people in this world that do,[/bq]
It's pissing me off cause my family only counts you as a person if you're white, christian, conservative and have at least three kids.

My brother's called me a wetback on several occasions for being half Puerto Rican.

Since I'm not white, not conservative and don't have kids I'm not a person.  I'm never telling them I'm not christian cause I'm already low enough on the totem pole as it is.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539f2b15636872743d2c0100#post_539f2b15636872743d2c0100

And I thought my dad was an asshole.

"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539f2b15636872743d2c0100#post_539f2b15636872743d2c0100


i feel like if i was around christian nutjobs i would do everyting to piss them off, like paint sacrilegious images.

(or play my goblin collection out loud, which includes little phrases like "jesus motherfucking theresa")

the thing that i can least stand is obsessed christian.

damn do people still sue the term wetback? i mean i try not to get offended by much but still its too ignorant.

[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539f27aa6368723333370100#post_539f27aa6368723333370100
Well all I can really do is give moral support through the internet.
I know you're a good person. And even if they don't give two shits about you there are people in this world that do,[/bq]
It's pissing me off cause my family only counts you as a person if you're white, christian, conservative and have at least three kids.

My brother's called me a wetback on several occasions for being half Puerto Rican.

Since I'm not white, not conservative and don't have kids I'm not a person.  I'm never telling them I'm not christian cause I'm already low enough on the totem pole as it is.[/bq]

I hope you don't mind me saying this, I really don't, but I think I'd punch your brother in the face if I ever met him.
topics.author: 515ddf93a4c72d8a1f000d57

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539f2baa6368720d5e1a0100#post_539f2baa6368720d5e1a0100
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539f2b15636872743d2c0100#post_539f2b15636872743d2c0100
Damn. That's just....
And I thought my dad was an asshole.[/bq]
There's reasons why I don't talk about my past personal life; cause it gets continuously darker and darker and darker and grim.

If you want to know just how dark; imagine being kept in a 5' x 10' room for ten years; sure you can go to school, but anything else bad things happened AND IT STILL GETS DARKER.


You can probably guess why I need to talk to a psychologist today.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
